dust_storm.title: Dust Storm
dust_storm.description: Solar Dust Storm detected. Solar panels offline.

oxygen_leak.title: Oxygen Leak
oxygen_leak.description: A breach in a habitat dome is causing a slow loss of atmosphere.

food_shipment_delay.title: Food Shipment Delay
food_shipment_delay.description: Supply drop missed its scheduled arrival window.

solar_surge.title: Solar Surge
solar_surge.description: An unexpected solar flare boosts power output temporarily.

bot_malfunction.title: Bot Malfunction
bot_malfunction.description: Automated repair bots are down for diagnostics.

colony_celebration.title: Colony Celebration
colony_celebration.description: A morale boost event improves efficiency across systems.

colonist_born.title: Colonist Born
colonist_born.description: A child has been born in the colony â€” a rare sign of hope. However, even infants must eat.

efficient_recycling.title: Efficient Recycling
efficient_recycling.description: Automated systems optimize waste conversion, reducing food usage.

power_conduit_short.title: Power Conduit Short
power_conduit_short.description: A conduit failure causes a significant power drain across systems.

fungal_contamination.title: Fungal Contamination
fungal_contamination.description: A fungal outbreak has spoiled a portion of the food reserves.

thin_atmosphere_pocket.title: Thin Atmosphere Pocket
thin_atmosphere_pocket.description: Sensors detect a shift in atmospheric density. Oxygen use rises.

greenhouse_bloom.title: Greenhouse Bloom
greenhouse_bloom.description: A burst of photosynthesis has resulted in an unexpected surplus of food.

geothermal_tap_discovered.title: Geothermal Tap Discovered
geothermal_tap_discovered.description: A geothermal vent has been harnessed, providing steady auxiliary power.

power_bonus.description: Free passive power generated each day

breakthrough_in_biotech.title: Breakthrough in Biotech
breakthrough_in_biotech.description: Scientists discover new microbes that boost crop yields and oxygen efficiency.
